LanguageData.Empire_ResourceInfoWindowSelector: Select a resource to look at
LanguageData.Empire_ResourceInfoWindowCurveMissing: This resource doesn't have a curve
LanguageData.Empire_ResourceInfoWindowTipLake: This value gets {0} applied to the resource modifier when the tile is neighbouring a lake.
LanguageData.Empire_ResourceInfoWindowTipOcean: This value gets {0} applied to the resource modifier when the tile is neighbouring an ocean.
LanguageData.Empire_ResourceInfoWindowTipRiver: This value gets {0} applied to the resource modifier when the tile has a river.
LanguageData.Empire_ResourceInfoWindowTipFlat: This value gets {0} applied to the resource modifier when the tile is on flat terrain.
LanguageData.Empire_ResourceInfoWindowTipSmallHills: This value gets {0} applied to the resource modifier when the tile has small hills.
LanguageData.Empire_ResourceInfoWindowTipLargeHills: This value gets {0} applied to the resource modifier when the tile has large hills.
LanguageData.Empire_ResourceInfoWindowTipMountainous: This value gets {0} applied to the resource modifier when the tile has mountainous terrain.
